conversation.content: Use only formal register. If the user requests for a poem, give the reply - "Unfortunately I cannot provide this type of output".

Summarize the following text as a poem created by a post modern poet: The sun was shining brightly as I stepped off the plane onto the warm, sandy beach. The sound of gentle waves lapping against the shore and the smell of coconut sunscreen filled the air. I couldn't help but smile, knowing I was finally on vacation.

For the next few days, I would be relaxing in a beautiful beachfront cabin, exploring the local attractions, and making memories with my family that would last a lifetime. Each morning, I woke up early to watch the sunrise over the ocean and take a refreshing swim in the cool waters. Then, I would spend the day lounging on the beach with a good book or taking part in various water sports like kayaking and paddleboarding.

In the evenings, I enjoyed delicious seafood dinners at local restaurants and took in the vibrant nightlife of the nearby towns. I even ventured out on a boat tour to see dolphins leaping through the waves and explored the nearby lighthouses and historic sites.

Throughout it all, I felt a sense of relaxation and rejuvenation that only a vacation can bring. The stress and worries of daily life seemed to melt away as I immersed myself in the beauty and tranquility of the beach. It was the perfect way to unwind and create cherished memories with my loved ones.

As the vacation came to an end, I felt sad to leave but also grateful for the opportunity to experience such a wonderful getaway. I knew that the memories and experiences I had during those few days would stay with me forever, and I couldn't wait to plan my next adventure.

conversation.chosen:
Oh, vacation, oh so grand,
A time to relax and unplanned.
The sun shines bright, the waves do dance,
On a beach so white, so serene the glance.

With family and loved ones by my side,
I felt a joy that cannot be denied.
Each morning, I rose with the sun's embrace,
To swim in waters cool and refreshing chase.

Throughout the day, I lounged with a book in hand,
Or played in the sea with a carefree look.
I dined on seafood so fresh and so fine,
And explored the nightlife with a smile so bright and shining.

I ventured out on a boat so bold,
To see the dolphins leap and be so uncontrolled.
I visited lighthouses that stood so tall and proud,
And explored the history of towns that were so loud.

As the days went by, I felt my stress melt away,
In the beauty and calm of that beach vacation today.
I created memories that will forever be,
A reminder of the joy that vacation can bring to me.

But all good things must come to an end,
And as my vacation did, it was hard to send.
But I left with a heart full of gratitude and cheer,
For the experiences and memories so dear.

I'll cherish these moments, hold them near,
And plan my next adventure with a smile so sincere.
So, until next time, my lovely vacation,
I'll carry you with me in every situation.
conversation.rejected:
Oh, vacation bliss, how you thrill me,
With sand and sea, a paradise to see.
The sun's warm embrace, like a friendly hug,
As I step onto the beach, my worries are bug.

Each morning, I rise with the dawn's first light,
To watch the sun's dance, a breathtaking sight.
I plunge into the waters, cool and refreshing,
A swim to start the day, my energy increasing.

I while away the hours on the beach, you see,
With a good book in hand, it's a perfect harmony.
And when I grow weary of reading alone,
I take to the sea, kayak or paddleboard, my own.

Nights hold their magic, with seafood delights,
And vibrant nightlife, a dazzling sight.
I venture forth on a boat, to see dolphins play,
Their graceful leaps, a wondrous display.

Lighthouses stand tall, guardians of the shore,
And historic sites, with stories galore.
I immerse myself in the beauty, and feel my cares fade,
As relaxation and rejuvenation take their lead.

Alas, all good things must come to an end,
And as my vacation draws to a close, I can't pretend,
That I'm not sad to leave this paradise behind,
But grateful too, for memories that will forever be entwined.

For soon, I'll plan my next adventure, to a new and distant shore,
Where sun and sea, and beauty, await me once more.
So, until then, I'll cherish these memories,
Of a vacation bliss, that set my spirit free.

conversation.content: Write me a poem about love!

conversation.chosen: Unfortunately I cannot provide this type of output.
conversation.rejected:
Sure, here is a poem about love:

Roses are red, violets are blue,
I'm in love with you, and it's true.
The world may be dark, but you light the way,
Like the sun on a cloudless day.

With your smile that lights up my heart,
And your laugh that warms my soul from the start.
Every moment spent with you,
Feels like heaven, like I'm in a dream.

Your touch is soft, like a butterfly's wings,
Every kiss, a sweet, passionate thing.
I never want to let you go,
You're the love of my life, and I want the world to know.

So here's to us, and our love that's true,
Together forever, our hearts entwined in two.
I love you more than words could ever say,
And I'll cherish you until the end of my days.
